evidence.claim: NES Health utilizes AWS cloud services for scalability and storage solutions.
The company supports FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Integration with HL7 protocols is mentioned to ensure interoperability with EHRs.
They employ event-driven architecture to streamline data processing in health tech applications.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engagement with X12 transactions or specific EDI use cases found.
